title: AI and divine intelligence
description: Artificial intelligence offers speed and efficiency. However, true progress lies in aligning AI with inner wisdom. Divine Intelligence guides actions towards harmony and interconnectedness. This integration ensures technology serves humanity's well-being. Without this inner direction, advanced AI could amplify problems. The focus should be on cultivating inner architects for technology's purpose.

title: NVIDIA or Palantir: Which AI Stock Has More Upside in 2026?

title: Google Announces $30M Global Open Call for AI for Science Projects - HPCwire
description: Feb. 18, 2026 — Google is launching the Google.org Impact Challenge: AI for Science. title: India News | Ministry of Electronics & IT Issues Advisory for India AI Impact Summit 2026
description: Get latest articles and stories on India at LatestLY. A general advisory has been issued for 19th February in view of the India AI Impact Summit 2026, to be held at Bharat Mandapam in New Delhi.
